DOC.brief_summary: This enhance meter feature raise awareness among patient provide additional information regard glycemic control Healthcare Professional visit . This information may facilitate increase dialogue patient Healthcare Professional remind patient importance glycemic control . This study evaluate user 's ability use enhance meter feature .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : IC 1 . Age subject 18 year old IC 2 . Type I type II diabetes inclusive follow population : 1 . Mixed insulin therapy 2 . Basal insulin therapy 3 . Bolus insulin therapy 4 . CSII therapies 5 . MDI therapies 6 . Noninsulin diabetic treatment ( oral injectable ) 7 . Life style ( exercise diet ) diabetes management IC 3 . Able speak read English proficiently Exclusion criterion EC 1 . Pregnant EC 2 . Hct < 20 > 60 EC 3 . Work BGM competitor company ( include , limited Lifescan , Roche , Abbott ) EC 4 . Homeless EC 5 . Incarcerated EC 6 . Institutionalized EC 7 . Employees student Research Site , include Principal Investigator , directly involve conduct protocol . EC 8 . Has condition Principal Investigator believe may interfere subject 's participation study . EC 9 . Previous experience use MyStar Extra BGMS
